title: #291: Balding Eagles (@KurtMetzger, @Seanytime, @MarkNorm)
itunes:title: Balding Eagles with Kurt Metzger, Sean Donnelly, & Mark Normand
description: Mark Normand, Sean Donnelly, and Kurt Metzger came to my apartment talk about the number 2 most important issue facing men today; balding. (boners are number 1). It was mostly fun meanderings but we still managed to talk all about hair loss from time to time in between making ourselves laugh.
